snippet.title: Kingdom Rush Frontiers on PC! (Official)
snippet.description:
Coming to Steam on July 25th - Add it to your Wishlist!
http://store.steampowered.com/app/458710


It also be coming soon to GOG and Humble Bundle.

The super acclaimed sequel of the original Kingdom Rush will now be available on Windows, Mac OS and Linux.

So, get ready to defend the Kingdom in distant and unforgiving lands.
Don't miss the chance to fight on dangerous deserts, treacherous coasts and deadly jungles!

Kingdom Rush Frontiers for PC comes with all Heroes available, improved visuals and a few surprises in the upcoming free updates.

So grab your sword, bow or artillery shell and join the most action packed Tower Defense of all times.

For the Kingdom!
